notes: stdio: For local integrations (Claude Desktop, LM Studio, MCP Inspector)
streamable-http: For web clients and remote access via HTTP/SSE

eager_load.description: Load model at server startup instead of on first request
notes: false: Model loads on first request (default - saves memory)
true: Model loads at startup (use --eager-load flag or set this to true)

model_ttl_minutes.description: Unload model after N minutes of inactivity to free memory
notes: >0: Unload after N minutes of no requests (saves ~8GB VRAM when idle)
1: Process one image at a time (safest, prevents GPU OOM)
